resources.string: Application is used to search for WKD schedule.
There was a problem connecting with internet. Check if you are connected. If problem repeats tell us about it!
Problem with saving to local database.
There was a problem while updating local database. If it repeats please tell us about it!
You are at last station, you cannot choose this station!

"Shortcuts:

- A - not riding between W-wa Śródmieście WKD - Milanówek from monday to friday except christmass; between Podkowa Leśna - Milanówek in christmass days and saturdays
- D - riding from monday to friday excepts christmass
- 1 - don't rides in july and august
- 2 - kursuje tylko w lipcu i sierpniu
- 3 - riding from monday to friday except christmass

 WKD Schedule automatically now when is christmass day, week day or normal day and knows when are vacations. It only shows real connections. But user can see all connections hitting menu button: "Show all". 

On left size there is information how much time left for train departure. Application shows connection 5 hours ahead. Also trains it shows trains that leave, to 5 minutes ago."

"WKD Schedule 1.6

 Application is unofficial appliaction of WKD schedule.

 Message published by users are theirs private messages. Author does not hold responsibility for what they writes.

 Thanks for Dant for icons.

 © 2012 Paweł Janeczek

"
Choose date and time of departure:
There was an error during sending message
Local schedule database (does not need internet connection)
Checking on starting application if there is new schedule database.
User name, which is used in messages

Do you want have local schedule? 
\If you choose yes, it will download WKD schedule and you want have to connect with internet to check for connections. 

If you choose yes, on every search application will use internet.
There is new WKD Schedule. Do you want to download it?
Details of connections are only visible when you use local schedule database.
No internet connection - application cannot check if there is new schedule.
New schedule! If you want to download it choose update from menu. If you want update it application will use online mode.
Your schedule is up to date.
There was an error during new version checking.
"There was an error during schedule download. Check connection and retry."
"If you want to turn of automatic schedule checking go to settings."
"Do you like WKD Schedule?\nPlease buy premium version of application, without ads!"
Do you want to turn on push messages?\n\nYou will be noticed about users comments and WKD events.
There is new feature - Push Notifications. More info on application play market page. You can turn it off in settings.
